welcome_message_body: Welcome to El Tigre, Venezuela! Known for its vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Domino's Pizza
restaurants.description: Domino's Pizza is a pizzeria located in El Tigre.
restaurants.address: Centro Comercial Unimall, El Tigre 6050, Anzoategui

restaurants.name: Panificadora El Tigre
restaurants.description: Panificadora El Tigre is a bakery located in El Tigre.
restaurants.address: Av. Francisco de Miranda (1ra. Carrera), El Tigre 6055, Anzoategui

restaurants.name: Drums Bar & Food
restaurants.description: Drums Bar & Food is a american restaurant located in El Tigre.
restaurants.address: CC San Remo Mall (Av. Jesús Subero), El Tigre 6050, Anzoategui

restaurants.name: Exquisiteces Al Carbón
restaurants.description: Exquisiteces Al Carbón is a bbq joint located in El Tigre.
restaurants.address: Frente A La Plaza Revenga (Calle 18 Sur), El Tigre 6050, Anzoategui

restaurants.name: Frutas Tropicales
restaurants.description: Frutas Tropicales is a breakfast spot located in El Tigre.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edmundo Barrios Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Edmundo Barrios Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
